title: post
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

acct.description: The web account that made the post.

acct:site.description: The site or service associated with the account.

client.description: The source address of the post.

client:ipv4.description: The source IPv4 address of the post.

client:ipv6.description: The source IPv6 address of the post.

acct:user.description: The unique identifier for the account.

time.description: The date and time that the post was made.

deleted.description: The message was deleted by the poster.

url.description: The URL where the post is published / visible.

file.description: The file that was attached to the post.

replyto.description: The post that this post is in reply to.

repost.description: The original post that this is a repost of.

loc.description: The location that the post was reportedly sent from.

place.description: The place that the post was reportedly sent from.

place:name.description: The name of the place that the post was reportedly sent from. Used for entity resolution.

latlong.description: The place that the post was reportedly sent from.

channel.description: The channel where the post was made.
